ygData.subject: Re: RE: Any one Know where Lord Grimlot in Neriak Is?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I believe there is a Lord Grimrot, and a Lord Grimlot I m not even sure about that, though... :) I ll see if I can find out from my higher level
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I believe there is a Lord Grimrot, and a Lord Grimlot

I'm not even sure about that, though... :)
I'll see if I can find out from my higher level friends

Taluvil
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 7:59 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Any one Know where Lord Grimlot in Neriak Is?


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> lord grimlot is in south karana, not neriak. if you mean the quest info
> that claims the lute of the gypsy princess is for the electrum-bladed
> wakazishi it is NOT correct info.
>
> Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> Erisi Dlarit, Level 21 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
